I had an account there for over 4 years until early 2024 when they implemented KYC-for-all, no exceptions. Had to submit multiple photos and videos to get my coins off the exchange. They will hold your coins hostage until you comply with their whims. My rating of them now: AVOID AT ALL COSTS!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa…
list_of_reviews.review: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa indentification. I tryed many times to recover my account. I showed my passport aswell i know my log in. I offered them to show anything they want but they only accept a transfer code from another server. I dont know this and aswell most servers dont even exist anymore. Basically they steal my coins this way since they refuse to help me. Feels a bit criminal to me :(

list_of_reviews.review_title: Worse customer support I have ever…
list_of_reviews.review: Worse customer support I have ever seen. My physical card is not working and I have been in contact with then for 3 weeks, every time they repeat their useless and irrelevant respond although they declare that they have checked what is the problem!Very low skill customer support!

Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Watch out from Trading bots; they may not exactly do what you expect...
list_of_reviews.review: Been a user of KuCoin for a long time, unfortunately I am starting to doubt the reliability of the future's bot. I had a VRA entry of 0.0073 and set the tp to 0.008222; the service indicates it was tp'd, however, the price never reached that area and my bot was closed; It happened 3 times already with similar issues and customer service is not being very useful or knowing how to help. Bot ID: 1452428525692232
my Kucoin account is hacked, I ask you for help several times with no response. I don't recommend Kucoin, it's not safe

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Extract key phrases and words that frequently appear in the reviews, which might indicate common areas of concern or praise for kucoin.com. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Common praise for KuCoin includes "efficient processes," "robust security," and "speed." Frequent concerns are "customer service," "high commissions," "email spams," and "P2P issues." These key phrases highlight the platform's strengths in operations and security, but also recurring issues with user support and costs.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Calculate the average rating from the reviews and analyze the distribution of ratings to understand the general user satisfaction level. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: The average rating is 1.5, derived from ratings of 1 and 2. This low average indicates significant user dissatisfaction, with common issues in customer service, high commissions, email spams, and P2P problems overshadowing positive feedback on efficiency, security, and speed.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Generate concise review summary to capture the gist of user opinions without needing to read through each review fully. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Users appreciate efficient processes, robust security, and speed but criticize poor customer service, high commissions, email spams, and P2P issues. The average rating of 1.5 reflects general dissatisfaction, with specific, informed content contrasting with common concerns about transparency and service quality.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Contrast the topics mentioned in positive reviews with those mentioned in negative reviews to determine key differentiators in user experiences. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Positive reviews highlight efficient processes, robust security, and speed with specific, informed content. Negative reviews criticize customer service, high commissions, email spams, and P2P issues, often citing repetitive, generic phrasing. Key differentiators are content quality, specificity, and user service experiences.

prompts_output.Prompt: Considering the date, rating, title, and content of the review: Analyze mentions of customer support interactions in the reviews to gauge the effectiveness and responsiveness of the kucoin.com support team. Provide your explanation in less than 50 words.
prompts_output.Output: Kucoin's customer support is highly criticized, described as unhelpful, with staff providing generic responses and directing users to submit tickets. The support team is deemed ineffective and unresponsive, leading to frustration and unresolved issues.

overall_prompt_summary: The reviews reveal a balance between positive and negative feedback, with key themes emerging around efficiency, security, and customer service. Positive reviews commend the platform for its efficient processes, robust security measures, and the use of coherent, specific language that reflects informed decision-making. However, negative feedback highlights significant issues with customer service, high commissions, frequent email spams, and problems with peer-to-peer (P2P) services. The critical issues suggest a need for improved customer support, reduced commission fees, and better management of communication practices to avoid spamming. Further investigation could focus on enhancing user experience in these areas to address the common concerns and improve overall satisfaction.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin is not available for US…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin is not available for US customers.  Since I joined long before that fact I have been blocked from moving funds to my other US accounts.  I went to their telegram page and was harassed and my phone was robo called over 100 times in just a few minutes.  I deleted telegram to prevent them from locking up my phone.  I suppose I'm just out my $1000 bucks in crypto.  What a scam.  I hope they are crushed and experience due retribution.

Im actively using KuCoin for a few years and even have their KuCard. Yesterday I've realized when you do fast trade (Ive bought 321 USDT for 300€) but it was supposed to be 326,34 USDT, the only fee menitoned was "0.3€" so im wondering where the other 5$ went.Then, today ive bought $10 in Litecoin using USDT - 10 USDT were removed but I received only 9.40$ worth of Litecoin.another 0.60$ (or 6%) fees and I've no clue where they come from, also contacted them about this issue but their response was just "we cant do anything", weirdly didnt explained "why" even tho that was my one and only question.not sure about this company anymore.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Without any reason account termination and restricted of fund withdrawal
list_of_reviews.review: I like Kucoin platform. And my account is going normal,  nothing was happened to it. Spot, future and P2P trading are going well. There was no appeal.Unfortunately I got email saying that your account is terminated and withdrawal your fund in 48 hr. After that restricted fund withdrawal When I report the issue to customer service they escalated the issue to concern body. Is ther any one whose account terminated and fundwithdrawal restricted without any reason and information,  please share your experiences. Still no reply, please share your experiences

They ask me a small amount to cash out for the merchant, and then it doubles and becomes huge. They told me they would not refund my payment if I did not give another huge amount because my account was frozen. They keep telling me I have made a mistake in withdrawing, but in fact, their system keeps rejecting my refund request. When I tried to access their website to withdraw a portion of the amount, they told me my account was frozen. The finance department told me to complain to anyone I like.

Ticket email number: 4048607I would rate kucoin overall just like binance for 1 star. For blocking account for no reason and asking for many documents even tho I didn't do big transactions. I made some xmr deposits and they locked my withdrawals. Now few weeks and they request screenshots from wallet that these transactions were sent. It literally doesn't make sense.Avoid at all costs. There are better exchanges

list_of_reviews.review_title: During P2P arbitration this company has…
list_of_reviews.review: During P2P arbitration this company has been absolutely awful. They never solve anything just ask for more info. They send out pre written responses and barely look over the grievance. There's no customer support line either. I would avoid these worthless eaters.

Kucoin has interesting earning products but the customer support is a disaster. If you have assets there, pray you don't need their help then you have to forget about your assets.All of the customer support personnel are witless and dumb. When you reach online chat they answer you with hackneyed responses and direct you to submit a ticket and then leave the chat. The people who answer the tickets are also dimwitted and answer you with unrelated and irresponsible responses.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I f I Can give zero I gived it
list_of_reviews.review: I f I Can give zero I gived it. I lost access to my E-Mail with which I registered and it is more than one month Iam sending then proof and screen from my account and videos that account belongs to me and did all what they asked for some videos I sent them even as internal message from my account and everytime they asks for a New information till they stopped doing anything or even answering my message and my funds are in account and Cant withdraw them or even trade. They will not solve any problem and they havent any customer Service line simple avoid them.
I do love the platform, the ease at which you can buy and sell, and the variety of coins they have. But their customer service and support is beyond terrible. Slow, unhelpful and often incompetent.

list_of_reviews.review_title: No unsubscribe option for their news…
list_of_reviews.review: No unsubscribe option for their news email list.

They are ridicolous. I opened the account and sent funds. After, I need to withdraw funds and they ask documents, authentications, new passwords, source of funds, KYC, bank statements.... otherwise funds remain sequestrated!!!!I am trying to give what they request, and I don't know what will happen but this is strongly unfair. What will happen if I cannot give them what they request? If they refuse my photo? Do they retain funds forever?If my situation is irregular or incomplete they must regularize it BEFORE receiving funds. After they receive funds, if something is missing, they can block new operations, BUT NOT WITHDRAWALS. THAT IS MY MONEY. They cannot sequestrate funds!!!!! Stay away!!!!

Beware of this app!!! Protect your identity and please don’t do the KYC or deposit any money. This app is a drain. The customer support is like speaking to a wall. They either respond saying your issue is resolved even without resolving it and close the ticket indicating g no response. I had a hard time dealing with their support. I submitted my details nearly 4mnths ago and still the KYC is not done, which they claim should be done latest by 7 days. You can’t withdraw without KYC.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Do you enjoy endless KYC games?

I submitted my details nearly 4mnths ago and still the KYC is not done, which they claim should be done latest by 7 days. You can’t withdraw without KYC.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Watch out from Trading bots; they may not exactly do what you expect...

Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Without any reason account termination and restricted of fund withdrawal

After that restricted fund withdrawal When I report the issue to customer service they escalated the issue to concern body. They ask me a small amount to cash out for the merchant, and then it doubles and becomes huge. They told me they would not refund my payment if I did not give another huge amount because my account was frozen. They keep telling me I have made a mistake in withdrawing, but in fact, their system keeps rejecting my refund request. When I tried to access their website to withdraw a portion of the amount, they told me my account was frozen. The finance department told me to complain to anyone I like.

Ticket email number: 4048607I would rate kucoin overall just like binance for 1 star. For blocking account for no reason and asking for many documents even tho I didn't do big transactions. There are better exchanges

When you reach online chat they answer you with hackneyed responses and direct you to submit a ticket and then leave the chat. The people who answer the tickets are also dimwitted and answer you with unrelated and irresponsible responses.

They will not solve any problem and they havent any customer Service line simple avoid them.

They are ridicolous. I opened the account and sent funds. After, I need to withdraw funds and they ask documents, authentications, new passwords, source of funds, KYC, bank statements.... otherwise funds remain sequestrated!!!!I am trying to give what they request, and I don't know what will happen but this is strongly unfair. Do they retain funds forever?If my situation is irregular or incomplete they must regularize it BEFORE receiving funds. They will hold your coins hostage until you comply with their whims. My rating of them now: AVOID AT ALL COSTS!

Just f****** fantastic!!!! KuCoin has grown on me hard and I am kicking myself for leaving it until now, to fully immerse my time in the experience KuCoin has to offer. All the parts that are enjoyed amongst different exchanges, have been brought together for a more complete trading platform. No issues for me thus far... The challenging thing though is to navigate your way through the fully loaded platform which takes some time. Effort + Efficiency = $$$$$$Keep it up there humans!!! Please don't be in the news soon with legal issues. My heart will be broken.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Watch out from Trading bots; they may not exactly do what you expect...
list_of_reviews.review: Been a user of KuCoin for a long time, unfortunately I am starting to doubt the reliability of the future's bot. I had a VRA entry of 0.0073 and set the tp to 0.008222; the service indicates it was tp'd, however, the price never reached that area and my bot was closed; It happened 3 times already with similar issues and customer service is not being very useful or knowing how to help. Bot ID: 1452428525692232

list_of_reviews.review: I had a $6000 buy leverage trade that was getting close to my liquidation price so i placed a small sell trade to decrease the liquidation price but the liquidation price never changed! I repeated the sell trade a total of 3 times with each time being confirmed. The liquidation price NEVER changed. I got liquidated!! It barely reached the price then of course the price immediately bounced back up. Ive been communication for weeks with customer service and they only say " please send any screen shots you may have"Who would have screen shots ??On every issue a person may have their only response is screen shots!! They say they cant see my trading history- thats a lie!!! On every transaction with an exchange , the exchange can do a forensic audit but customer service does not aknowledge this. They ALL repeat the same script. "Screenshot" They are either completely ignorant or willfully stupid or worse....My previous trade the price of xrp went to my liquidation price and bounced back up. I lost several thousand then but took the loss as part of doing leverage trading however this trade i did what i needed to to stay in the trade but kucoins platform screwed me. Customer service was and is unwilling to even consider any responsability!!!

installing app... idnumber is not a number name in belgium , use terms proper to your country but thats too much effort probably.other thing making over money from bank also not userfriendly. i removed the app, never again.
Very bad platform, promised to give 20 USDT but then asked for 16000$ before giving me 20 USDT and then it won't let me withdraw the 10 USDT that I already put on the platform.
This platform is just spammers. Once registered, you receive 5 emails per day and you have no option to unsubscribe from receiving this garbage.

list_of_reviews.review: Awful site everything is confusing and they take a large sum of money when you withdraw there is no point in depositing. If your unsure DO NOT DEPOSIT ANY MONEY AT ALL DO NOT USE THIS SITE CLICK OF IT NOW.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Even after verifying my id they are not…
list_of_reviews.review: Even after verifying my id they are not unfreezing my account, they have held $12000 and are not letting me withdraw, a complete scam.And it has been 30 days I have been talking to them via email

Im actively using KuCoin for a few years and even have their KuCard. Yesterday I've realized when you do fast trade (Ive bought 321 USDT for 300€) but it was supposed to be 326,34 USDT, the only fee menitoned was "0.3€" so im wondering where the other 5$ went.Then, today ive bought $10 in Litecoin using USDT - 10 USDT were removed but I received only 9.40$ worth of Litecoin.another 0.60$ (or 6%) fees and I've no clue where they come from, also contacted them about this issue but their response was just "we cant do anything", weirdly didnt explained "why" even tho that was my one and only question.not sure about this company anymore.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin is not available for US…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin is not available for US customers.  Since I joined long before that fact I have been blocked from moving funds to my other US accounts.  I went to their telegram page and was harassed and my phone was robo called over 100 times in just a few minutes.  I deleted telegram to prevent them from locking up my phone.  I suppose I'm just out my $1000 bucks in crypto.  What a scam.  I hope they are crushed and experience due retribution.
They dont verify my account. I have been fully verified before and after changing my country they dont verify me anymore

list_of_reviews.review_title: Without any reason account termination and restricted of fund withdrawal
list_of_reviews.review: I like Kucoin platform. And my account is going normal,  nothing was happened to it. Spot, future and P2P trading are going well. There was no appeal.Unfortunately I got email saying that your account is terminated and withdrawal your fund in 48 hr. After that restricted fund withdrawal When I report the issue to customer service they escalated the issue to concern body. Is ther any one whose account terminated and fundwithdrawal restricted without any reason and information,  please share your experiences. Still no reply, please share your experiences

They ask me a small amount to cash out for the merchant, and then it doubles and becomes huge. They told me they would not refund my payment if I did not give another huge amount because my account was frozen. They keep telling me I have made a mistake in withdrawing, but in fact, their system keeps rejecting my refund request. When I tried to access their website to withdraw a portion of the amount, they told me my account was frozen. The finance department told me to complain to anyone I like.

Ticket email number: 4048607I would rate kucoin overall just like binance for 1 star. For blocking account for no reason and asking for many documents even tho I didn't do big transactions. I made some xmr deposits and they locked my withdrawals. Now few weeks and they request screenshots from wallet that these transactions were sent. It literally doesn't make sense.Avoid at all costs. There are better exchanges

list_of_reviews.review_title: During P2P arbitration this company has…
list_of_reviews.review: During P2P arbitration this company has been absolutely awful. They never solve anything just ask for more info. They send out pre written responses and barely look over the grievance. There's no customer support line either. I would avoid these worthless eaters.

Kucoin has interesting earning products but the customer support is a disaster. If you have assets there, pray you don't need their help then you have to forget about your assets.All of the customer support personnel are witless and dumb. When you reach online chat they answer you with hackneyed responses and direct you to submit a ticket and then leave the chat. The people who answer the tickets are also dimwitted and answer you with unrelated and irresponsible responses.
I do love the platform, the ease at which you can buy and sell, and the variety of coins they have. But their customer service and support is beyond terrible. Slow, unhelpful and often incompetent.

After, I need to withdraw funds and they ask documents, authentications, new passwords, source of funds, KYC, bank statements.... otherwise funds remain sequestrated!!!!I am trying to give what they request, and I don't know what will happen but this is strongly unfair. Probably the worst company in this industry for many reasons. Their app is problematic 99% of the time, and they offer no assistance at all to their customers. Withdrawing and depositing your assets is pretty much impossible and at this point i class all my investment as lost.Their 2FA authorisation email is never received when requested to login to their app and servicea, yet their company bombard you with promotions via email several times a day.
they took my money - 500 euros of bitcoin that disappeared just like that. Thanks guys, it gives a very great reputation for chinese/singaporian companies.
Added me out of nothing to a whatsapp group hosted by phone numbers from Africa and Asia. Only admins can text. Did they knew I watched videos about scammers on Youtube?

installing app... idnumber is not a number name in belgium , use terms proper to your country but thats too much effort probably.other thing making over money from bank also not userfriendly. i removed the app, never again.
I like the platform, it’s easy to use and there’s a large possibility to make money

I had a $6000 buy leverage trade that was getting close to my liquidation price so i placed a small sell trade to decrease the liquidation price but the liquidation price never changed! I repeated the sell trade a total of 3 times with each time being confirmed. The liquidation price NEVER changed. I got liquidated!! It barely reached the price then of course the price immediately bounced back up. Ive been communication for weeks with customer service and they only say " please send any screen shots you may have"Who would have screen shots ??On every issue a person may have their only response is screen shots!! They say they cant see my trading history- thats a lie!!! On every transaction with an exchange , the exchange can do a forensic audit but customer service does not aknowledge this. They ALL repeat the same script. "Screenshot" They are either completely ignorant or willfully stupid or worse....My previous trade the price of xrp went to my liquidation price and bounced back up. I lost several thousand then but took the loss as part of doing leverage trading however this trade i did what i needed to to stay in the trade but kucoins platform screwed me. Customer service was and is unwilling to even consider any responsability!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Awful site everything is confusing and…
list_of_reviews.review: Awful site everything is confusing and they take a large sum of money when you withdraw there is no point in depositing. If your unsure DO NOT DEPOSIT ANY MONEY AT ALL DO NOT USE THIS SITE CLICK OF IT NOW.

Im actively using KuCoin for a few years and even have their KuCard. Yesterday I've realized when you do fast trade (Ive bought 321 USDT for 300€) but it was supposed to be 326,34 USDT, the only fee menitoned was "0.3€" so im wondering where the other 5$ went.Then, today ive bought $10 in Litecoin using USDT - 10 USDT were removed but I received only 9.40$ worth of Litecoin.another 0.60$ (or 6%) fees and I've no clue where they come from, also contacted them about this issue but their response was just "we cant do anything", weirdly didnt explained "why" even tho that was my one and only question.not sure about this company anymore.
This platform is just spammers. Once registered, you receive 5 emails per day and you have no option to unsubscribe from receiving this garbage.
Very bad platform, promised to give 20 USDT but then asked for 16000$ before giving me 20 USDT and then it won't let me withdraw the 10 USDT that I already put on the platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin is not available for US…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin is not available for US customers.  Since I joined long before that fact I have been blocked from moving funds to my other US accounts.  I went to their telegram page and was harassed and my phone was robo called over 100 times in just a few minutes.  I deleted telegram to prevent them from locking up my phone.  I suppose I'm just out my $1000 bucks in crypto.  What a scam.  I hope they are crushed and experience due retribution.

Ticket email number: 4048607I would rate kucoin overall just like binance for 1 star. For blocking account for no reason and asking for many documents even tho I didn't do big transactions. I made some xmr deposits and they locked my withdrawals. Now few weeks and they request screenshots from wallet that these transactions were sent. It literally doesn't make sense.Avoid at all costs. There are better exchanges

list_of_reviews.review_title: Even after verifying my id they are not…
list_of_reviews.review: Even after verifying my id they are not unfreezing my account, they have held $12000 and are not letting me withdraw, a complete scam.And it has been 30 days I have been talking to them via email

list_of_reviews.review_title: Without any reason account termination and restricted of fund withdrawal
list_of_reviews.review: I like Kucoin platform. And my account is going normal,  nothing was happened to it. Spot, future and P2P trading are going well. There was no appeal.Unfortunately I got email saying that your account is terminated and withdrawal your fund in 48 hr. After that restricted fund withdrawal When I report the issue to customer service they escalated the issue to concern body. Is ther any one whose account terminated and fundwithdrawal restricted without any reason and information,  please share your experiences. Still no reply, please share your experiences

They ask me a small amount to cash out for the merchant, and then it doubles and becomes huge. They told me they would not refund my payment if I did not give another huge amount because my account was frozen. They keep telling me I have made a mistake in withdrawing, but in fact, their system keeps rejecting my refund request. When I tried to access their website to withdraw a portion of the amount, they told me my account was frozen. The finance department told me to complain to anyone I like.

list_of_reviews.review_title: During P2P arbitration this company has…
list_of_reviews.review: During P2P arbitration this company has been absolutely awful. They never solve anything just ask for more info. They send out pre written responses and barely look over the grievance. There's no customer support line either. I would avoid these worthless eaters.

Kucoin has interesting earning products but the customer support is a disaster. If you have assets there, pray you don't need their help then you have to forget about your assets.All of the customer support personnel are witless and dumb. When you reach online chat they answer you with hackneyed responses and direct you to submit a ticket and then leave the chat. The people who answer the tickets are also dimwitted and answer you with unrelated and irresponsible responses.
They dont verify my account. I have been fully verified before and after changing my country they dont verify me anymore
I do love the platform, the ease at which you can buy and sell, and the variety of coins they have. But their customer service and support is beyond terrible. Slow, unhelpful and often incompetent.

They are ridicolous. I opened the account and sent funds. After, I need to withdraw funds and they ask documents, authentications, new passwords, source of funds, KYC, bank statements.... otherwise funds remain sequestrated!!!!I am trying to give what they request, and I don't know what will happen but this is strongly unfair. Do they retain funds forever?If my situation is irregular or incomplete they must regularize it BEFORE receiving funds. After they receive funds, if something is missing, they can block new operations, BUT NOT WITHDRAWALS. THAT IS MY MONEY. They cannot sequestrate funds!!!!! Stay away!!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: I really don't like giving 5 stars out…
list_of_reviews.review: I really don't like giving 5 stars out because more often then not I get burned right after.However, Kucoin has been my go to crypto platform.  Even with KYC, there was some issues with my account not showing verified when it was.  Kucoin was nice enough to set my account to allow me full access until the issues were resolved on their side.Every time I have contacted support, I get a response within a few hours.  The site is very responsive and when it is not, they warn me ahead of time.  I know I am a small customer and don't have millions in my account, but they treat me like I do.Remember this is not yet available in the USA, its because of US regulations.  So don't knock them down because of this.I do love the bonuses they offer for trading.  They have spotted coupons from time to time to allow me to test my skills at trading.  They allowed me to keep the profits as the coupons expired.I do definitely recommend this trading platform, but do go slow if you are a beginner as there is lots to learn about trading...any questions, I am happy to answer...thanks...Stan...

list_of_reviews.review: Scam. I’ve had 1050 USDT with them for 2 years that is not showing in my account. I’ve submitted tickets with them and provided proof of the money transfer. I have the transaction from the Blockchain. They refuse to give me access to the funds or send them back where they came from. If they do this for 1000 dollars, imagine how it would be with the value of a bitcoin. Avoid. Chinese scammers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I really don't like giving 5 stars out…
list_of_reviews.review: I really don't like giving 5 stars out because more often then not I get burned right after.However, Kucoin has been my go to crypto platform.  Even with KYC, there was some issues with my account not showing verified when it was.  Kucoin was nice enough to set my account to allow me full access until the issues were resolved on their side.Every time I have contacted support, I get a response within a few hours.  The site is very responsive and when it is not, they warn me ahead of time.  I know I am a small customer and don't have millions in my account, but they treat me like I do.Remember this is not yet available in the USA, its because of US regulations.  So don't knock them down because of this.I do love the bonuses they offer for trading.  They have spotted coupons from time to time to allow me to test my skills at trading.  They allowed me to keep the profits as the coupons expired.I do definitely recommend this trading platform, but do go slow if you are a beginner as there is lots to learn about trading...any questions, I am happy to answer...thanks...Stan...
Lowest trading fees, easy to use.  I've had years of frequent use with no issues.

Great experience so far! I could buy what I needed of crypto and withdraw it directly from the wallet in which I needed to spend it. I can't complain after having a negative experience with a competitor.

Probably the worst company in this industry for many reasons. Their app is problematic 99% of the time, and they offer no assistance at all to their customers. Withdrawing and depositing your assets is pretty much impossible and at this point i class all my investment as lost.Their 2FA authorisation email is never received when requested to login to their app and servicea, yet their company bombard you with promotions via email several times a day.
they took my money - 500 euros of bitcoin that disappeared just like that. Thanks guys, it gives a very great reputation for chinese/singaporian companies.
Added me out of nothing to a whatsapp group hosted by phone numbers from Africa and Asia. Only admins can text. Did they knew I watched videos about scammers on Youtube?

list_of_reviews.review_title: This website is not a revenue…
list_of_reviews.review: This website is not a revenue generator, but it is the thieves who have planned to rob

list_of_reviews.review_title: Awful site everything is confusing and…
list_of_reviews.review: Awful site everything is confusing and they take a large sum of money when you withdraw there is no point in depositing. If your unsure DO NOT DEPOSIT ANY MONEY AT ALL DO NOT USE THIS SITE CLICK OF IT NOW.

Ticket email number: 4048607I would rate kucoin overall just like binance for 1 star. For blocking account for no reason and asking for many documents even tho I didn't do big transactions. I made some xmr deposits and they locked my withdrawals. Now few weeks and they request screenshots from wallet that these transactions were sent. It literally doesn't make sense.Avoid at all costs. There are better exchanges

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin is not available for US…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin is not available for US customers.  Since I joined long before that fact I have been blocked from moving funds to my other US accounts.  I went to their telegram page and was harassed and my phone was robo called over 100 times in just a few minutes.  I deleted telegram to prevent them from locking up my phone.  I suppose I'm just out my $1000 bucks in crypto.  What a scam.  I hope they are crushed and experience due retribution.

I had a $6000 buy leverage trade that was getting close to my liquidation price so i placed a small sell trade to decrease the liquidation price but the liquidation price never changed! I repeated the sell trade a total of 3 times with each time being confirmed. The liquidation price NEVER changed. I got liquidated!! It barely reached the price then of course the price immediately bounced back up. Ive been communication for weeks with customer service and they only say " please send any screen shots you may have"Who would have screen shots ??On every issue a person may have their only response is screen shots!! They say they cant see my trading history- thats a lie!!! On every transaction with an exchange , the exchange can do a forensic audit but customer service does not aknowledge this. They ALL repeat the same script. "Screenshot" They are either completely ignorant or willfully stupid or worse....My previous trade the price of xrp went to my liquidation price and bounced back up. I lost several thousand then but took the loss as part of doing leverage trading however this trade i did what i needed to to stay in the trade but kucoins platform screwed me. Customer service was and is unwilling to even consider any responsability!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: Without any reason account termination and restricted of fund withdrawal
list_of_reviews.review: I like Kucoin platform. And my account is going normal,  nothing was happened to it. Spot, future and P2P trading are going well. There was no appeal.Unfortunately I got email saying that your account is terminated and withdrawal your fund in 48 hr. After that restricted fund withdrawal When I report the issue to customer service they escalated the issue to concern body. Is ther any one whose account terminated and fundwithdrawal restricted without any reason and information,  please share your experiences. Still no reply, please share your experiences

list_of_reviews.review_title: During P2P arbitration this company has…
list_of_reviews.review: During P2P arbitration this company has been absolutely awful. They never solve anything just ask for more info. They send out pre written responses and barely look over the grievance. There's no customer support line either. I would avoid these worthless eaters.

They ask me a small amount to cash out for the merchant, and then it doubles and becomes huge. They told me they would not refund my payment if I did not give another huge amount because my account was frozen. They keep telling me I have made a mistake in withdrawing, but in fact, their system keeps rejecting my refund request. When I tried to access their website to withdraw a portion of the amount, they told me my account was frozen. The finance department told me to complain to anyone I like.
This platform is just spammers. Once registered, you receive 5 emails per day and you have no option to unsubscribe from receiving this garbage.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Even after verifying my id they are not…
list_of_reviews.review: Even after verifying my id they are not unfreezing my account, they have held $12000 and are not letting me withdraw, a complete scam.And it has been 30 days I have been talking to them via email

list_of_reviews.review_title: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa…
list_of_reviews.review: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa indentification. I tryed many times to recover my account. I showed my passport aswell i know my log in. I offered them to show anything they want but they only accept a transfer code from another server. I dont know this and aswell most servers dont even exist anymore. Basically they steal my coins this way since they refuse to help me. Feels a bit criminal to me :(
Very bad platform, promised to give 20 USDT but then asked for 16000$ before giving me 20 USDT and then it won't let me withdraw the 10 USDT that I already put on the platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unreliable crypto exchange with poor customer service
list_of_reviews.review: Do not trust this crypto exchange. Without any form of warning, it is no longer possible to claim rewards already earned with crypto staking. They simply disable the feature and refuse to find a solution to pay out my earned tokens. Customer service does not answer your questions. No solution is offered. Wondering why the authorities aren't investigating this yet.

list_of_reviews.review_title: This company is a complete scam
list_of_reviews.review: This company is a complete scam. Avoid at all costs. You will never be able to withdraw your money. I have asked to have access to my funds since April!! Customer service doesn't respond- Winnie, Jessica, Elaine, George purposely don't provide answers or make you jump through multiple hoops that lead to nowhere. How do these people sleep at night? Evil.

list_of_reviews.review_title: scammers who lure people into buying…
list_of_reviews.review: scammers who lure people into buying crypto in every possible way, but then you will never get that money back. Customer support responds with one phrase: "we are working on your problem".

Scam. I’ve had 1050 USDT with them for 2 years that is not showing in my account. I’ve submitted tickets with them and provided proof of the money transfer. I have the transaction from the Blockchain. They refuse to give me access to the funds or send them back where they came from. If they do this for 1000 dollars, imagine how it would be with the value of a bitcoin. Avoid. Chinese scammers.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I really don't like giving 5 stars out…
list_of_reviews.review: I really don't like giving 5 stars out because more often then not I get burned right after.However, Kucoin has been my go to crypto platform.  Even with KYC, there was some issues with my account not showing verified when it was.  Kucoin was nice enough to set my account to allow me full access until the issues were resolved on their side.Every time I have contacted support, I get a response within a few hours.  The site is very responsive and when it is not, they warn me ahead of time.  I know I am a small customer and don't have millions in my account, but they treat me like I do.Remember this is not yet available in the USA, its because of US regulations.  So don't knock them down because of this.I do love the bonuses they offer for trading.  They have spotted coupons from time to time to allow me to test my skills at trading.  They allowed me to keep the profits as the coupons expired.I do definitely recommend this trading platform, but do go slow if you are a beginner as there is lots to learn about trading...any questions, I am happy to answer...thanks...Stan...

Great experience so far! I could buy what I needed of crypto and withdraw it directly from the wallet in which I needed to spend it. I can't complain after having a negative experience with a competitor.

Probably the worst company in this industry for many reasons. Their app is problematic 99% of the time, and they offer no assistance at all to their customers. Withdrawing and depositing your assets is pretty much impossible and at this point i class all my investment as lost.Their 2FA authorisation email is never received when requested to login to their app and servicea, yet their company bombard you with promotions via email several times a day.
Lowest trading fees, easy to use.  I've had years of frequent use with no issues.
they took my money - 500 euros of bitcoin that disappeared just like that. Thanks guys, it gives a very great reputation for chinese/singaporian companies.

Ticket email number: 4048607I would rate kucoin overall just like binance for 1 star. For blocking account for no reason and asking for many documents even tho I didn't do big transactions. I made some xmr deposits and they locked my withdrawals. Now few weeks and they request screenshots from wallet that these transactions were sent. It literally doesn't make sense.Avoid at all costs. There are better exchanges
Added me out of nothing to a whatsapp group hosted by phone numbers from Africa and Asia. Only admins can text. Did they knew I watched videos about scammers on Youtube?

list_of_reviews.review_title: Awful site everything is confusing and…
list_of_reviews.review: Awful site everything is confusing and they take a large sum of money when you withdraw there is no point in depositing. If your unsure DO NOT DEPOSIT ANY MONEY AT ALL DO NOT USE THIS SITE CLICK OF IT NOW.

list_of_reviews.review_title: During P2P arbitration this company has…
list_of_reviews.review: During P2P arbitration this company has been absolutely awful. They never solve anything just ask for more info. They send out pre written responses and barely look over the grievance. There's no customer support line either. I would avoid these worthless eaters.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin is not available for US…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin is not available for US customers.  Since I joined long before that fact I have been blocked from moving funds to my other US accounts.  I went to their telegram page and was harassed and my phone was robo called over 100 times in just a few minutes.  I deleted telegram to prevent them from locking up my phone.  I suppose I'm just out my $1000 bucks in crypto.  What a scam.  I hope they are crushed and experience due retribution.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Without any reason account termination and restricted of fund withdrawal
list_of_reviews.review: I like Kucoin platform. And my account is going normal,  nothing was happened to it. Spot, future and P2P trading are going well. There was no appeal.Unfortunately I got email saying that your account is terminated and withdrawal your fund in 48 hr. After that restricted fund withdrawal When I report the issue to customer service they escalated the issue to concern body. Is ther any one whose account terminated and fundwithdrawal restricted without any reason and information,  please share your experiences. Still no reply, please share your experiences

They ask me a small amount to cash out for the merchant, and then it doubles and becomes huge. They told me they would not refund my payment if I did not give another huge amount because my account was frozen. They keep telling me I have made a mistake in withdrawing, but in fact, their system keeps rejecting my refund request. When I tried to access their website to withdraw a portion of the amount, they told me my account was frozen. The finance department told me to complain to anyone I like.

list_of_reviews.review_title: This website is not a revenue…
list_of_reviews.review: This website is not a revenue generator, but it is the thieves who have planned to rob

list_of_reviews.review_title: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa…
list_of_reviews.review: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa indentification. I tryed many times to recover my account. I showed my passport aswell i know my log in. I offered them to show anything they want but they only accept a transfer code from another server. I dont know this and aswell most servers dont even exist anymore. Basically they steal my coins this way since they refuse to help me. Feels a bit criminal to me :(

I had a $6000 buy leverage trade that was getting close to my liquidation price so i placed a small sell trade to decrease the liquidation price but the liquidation price never changed! I repeated the sell trade a total of 3 times with each time being confirmed. The liquidation price NEVER changed. I got liquidated!! It barely reached the price then of course the price immediately bounced back up. Ive been communication for weeks with customer service and they only say " please send any screen shots you may have"Who would have screen shots ??On every issue a person may have their only response is screen shots!! They say they cant see my trading history- thats a lie!!! On every transaction with an exchange , the exchange can do a forensic audit but customer service does not aknowledge this. They ALL repeat the same script. "Screenshot" They are either completely ignorant or willfully stupid or worse....My previous trade the price of xrp went to my liquidation price and bounced back up. I lost several thousand then but took the loss as part of doing leverage trading however this trade i did what i needed to to stay in the trade but kucoins platform screwed me. Customer service was and is unwilling to even consider any responsability!!!
This platform is just spammers. Once registered, you receive 5 emails per day and you have no option to unsubscribe from receiving this garbage.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Even after verifying my id they are not…
list_of_reviews.review: Even after verifying my id they are not unfreezing my account, they have held $12000 and are not letting me withdraw, a complete scam.And it has been 30 days I have been talking to them via email

list_of_reviews.review_title: The Essence of Cryptocurrency: Coins and Blockchain
list_of_reviews.review: **Title: The Essence of Cryptocurrency: Coins and Blockchain**Coins are digital assets that operate on decentralized blockchain technology, serving as mediums of exchange and stores of value. Unlike traditional currencies, cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum are secured through a distributed ledger system, where transactions are validated by a network of nodes, ensuring transparency and integrity. This innovative framework not only facilitates peer-to-peer transactions but also powers decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, enabling users to lend, borrow, and trade without intermediaries. As the cryptocurrency landscape evolves, the interplay between coins and blockchain is set to redefine financial systems and enhance global economic interactions.Please Visit website coinmedia.live

Scam. I’ve had 1050 USDT with them for 2 years that is not showing in my account. I’ve submitted tickets with them and provided proof of the money transfer. I have the transaction from the Blockchain. They refuse to give me access to the funds or send them back where they came from. If they do this for 1000 dollars, imagine how it would be with the value of a bitcoin. Avoid. Chinese scammers.

Probably the worst company in this industry for many reasons. Their app is problematic 99% of the time, and they offer no assistance at all to their customers. Withdrawing and depositing your assets is pretty much impossible and at this point i class all my investment as lost.Their 2FA authorisation email is never received when requested to login to their app and servicea, yet their company bombard you with promotions via email several times a day.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I really don't like giving 5 stars out…
list_of_reviews.review: I really don't like giving 5 stars out because more often then not I get burned right after.However, Kucoin has been my go to crypto platform.  Even with KYC, there was some issues with my account not showing verified when it was.  Kucoin was nice enough to set my account to allow me full access until the issues were resolved on their side.Every time I have contacted support, I get a response within a few hours.  The site is very responsive and when it is not, they warn me ahead of time.  I know I am a small customer and don't have millions in my account, but they treat me like I do.Remember this is not yet available in the USA, its because of US regulations.  So don't knock them down because of this.I do love the bonuses they offer for trading.  They have spotted coupons from time to time to allow me to test my skills at trading.  They allowed me to keep the profits as the coupons expired.I do definitely recommend this trading platform, but do go slow if you are a beginner as there is lots to learn about trading...any questions, I am happy to answer...thanks...Stan...

Great experience so far! I could buy what I needed of crypto and withdraw it directly from the wallet in which I needed to spend it. I can't complain after having a negative experience with a competitor.

Ticket email number: 4048607I would rate kucoin overall just like binance for 1 star. For blocking account for no reason and asking for many documents even tho I didn't do big transactions. I made some xmr deposits and they locked my withdrawals. Now few weeks and they request screenshots from wallet that these transactions were sent. It literally doesn't make sense.Avoid at all costs. There are better exchanges
they took my money - 500 euros of bitcoin that disappeared just like that. Thanks guys, it gives a very great reputation for chinese/singaporian companies.
Added me out of nothing to a whatsapp group hosted by phone numbers from Africa and Asia. Only admins can text. Did they knew I watched videos about scammers on Youtube?

list_of_reviews.review_title: Awful site everything is confusing and…
list_of_reviews.review: Awful site everything is confusing and they take a large sum of money when you withdraw there is no point in depositing. If your unsure DO NOT DEPOSIT ANY MONEY AT ALL DO NOT USE THIS SITE CLICK OF IT NOW.

list_of_reviews.review_title: During P2P arbitration this company has…
list_of_reviews.review: During P2P arbitration this company has been absolutely awful. They never solve anything just ask for more info. They send out pre written responses and barely look over the grievance. There's no customer support line either. I would avoid these worthless eaters.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Without any reason account termination and restricted of fund withdrawal
list_of_reviews.review: I like Kucoin platform. And my account is going normal,  nothing was happened to it. Spot, future and P2P trading are going well. There was no appeal.Unfortunately I got email saying that your account is terminated and withdrawal your fund in 48 hr. After that restricted fund withdrawal When I report the issue to customer service they escalated the issue to concern body. Is ther any one whose account terminated and fundwithdrawal restricted without any reason and information,  please share your experiences. Still no reply, please share your experiences

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin is not available for US…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin is not available for US customers.  Since I joined long before that fact I have been blocked from moving funds to my other US accounts.  I went to their telegram page and was harassed and my phone was robo called over 100 times in just a few minutes.  I deleted telegram to prevent them from locking up my phone.  I suppose I'm just out my $1000 bucks in crypto.  What a scam.  I hope they are crushed and experience due retribution.

They ask me a small amount to cash out for the merchant, and then it doubles and becomes huge. They told me they would not refund my payment if I did not give another huge amount because my account was frozen. They keep telling me I have made a mistake in withdrawing, but in fact, their system keeps rejecting my refund request. When I tried to access their website to withdraw a portion of the amount, they told me my account was frozen. The finance department told me to complain to anyone I like.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa…
list_of_reviews.review: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa indentification. I tryed many times to recover my account. I showed my passport aswell i know my log in. I offered them to show anything they want but they only accept a transfer code from another server. I dont know this and aswell most servers dont even exist anymore. Basically they steal my coins this way since they refuse to help me. Feels a bit criminal to me :(

list_of_reviews.review_title: Unreliable crypto exchange with poor customer service
list_of_reviews.review: Do not trust this crypto exchange. Without any form of warning, it is no longer possible to claim rewards already earned with crypto staking. They simply disable the feature and refuse to find a solution to pay out my earned tokens. Customer service does not answer your questions. No solution is offered. Wondering why the authorities aren't investigating this yet.

I had a $6000 buy leverage trade that was getting close to my liquidation price so i placed a small sell trade to decrease the liquidation price but the liquidation price never changed! I repeated the sell trade a total of 3 times with each time being confirmed. The liquidation price NEVER changed. I got liquidated!! It barely reached the price then of course the price immediately bounced back up. Ive been communication for weeks with customer service and they only say " please send any screen shots you may have"Who would have screen shots ??On every issue a person may have their only response is screen shots!! They say they cant see my trading history- thats a lie!!! On every transaction with an exchange , the exchange can do a forensic audit but customer service does not aknowledge this. They ALL repeat the same script. "Screenshot" They are either completely ignorant or willfully stupid or worse....My previous trade the price of xrp went to my liquidation price and bounced back up. I lost several thousand then but took the loss as part of doing leverage trading however this trade i did what i needed to to stay in the trade but kucoins platform screwed me. Customer service was and is unwilling to even consider any responsability!!!

list_of_reviews.review_title: I really don't like giving 5 stars out…
list_of_reviews.review: I really don't like giving 5 stars out because more often then not I get burned right after.However, Kucoin has been my go to crypto platform.  Even with KYC, there was some issues with my account not showing verified when it was.  Kucoin was nice enough to set my account to allow me full access until the issues were resolved on their side.Every time I have contacted support, I get a response within a few hours.  The site is very responsive and when it is not, they warn me ahead of time.  I know I am a small customer and don't have millions in my account, but they treat me like I do.Remember this is not yet available in the USA, its because of US regulations.  So don't knock them down because of this.I do love the bonuses they offer for trading.  They have spotted coupons from time to time to allow me to test my skills at trading.  They allowed me to keep the profits as the coupons expired.I do definitely recommend this trading platform, but do go slow if you are a beginner as there is lots to learn about trading...any questions, I am happy to answer...thanks...Stan...

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of the biggest scams in the industry. Their operating logic is to list as many coins as possible that have social visibility, e.g. lots of Twitter followers. This listing means that the customer acquisition costs almost nothing because the followers are excited by the listing, transfer the coins to Kucoin and then naturally trade the coin. This makes it possible, and I'm sure many of you have done the same, to trade other coins as well. These listings come up almost every day, several a week. And every now and then, Kucoin at one time delists 10-20 or several dozen coins at once. When I started actively updating this process on Kucoin's Telegram page, quite matter-of-factly questioning the numerous listings and the huge number of delistings, Kucoin so typically on the spur of the moment banned me and did not want to have an open discussion about their methods. Anyone who follows Kucoin can draw the same conclusion.

I signed up, because i had been deceived by third parties that no KYC verification is needed for depsoit, to find out that's not the case.Nevertheless when i tried to delete my account, they asked me for phone verification, that's INSANE and UNREALSITIC, submitting and revealing  my phone number for my account deletion ! No Way

Now I would like to withdraw my remaining USDT, and withdrawals have been suspended. A complete SCAM, shame on these people, and shame on me for trusting them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I really don't like giving 5 stars out…
list_of_reviews.review: I really don't like giving 5 stars out because more often then not I get burned right after.However, Kucoin has been my go to crypto platform.  Even with KYC, there was some issues with my account not showing verified when it was.  Kucoin was nice enough to set my account to allow me full access until the issues were resolved on their side.Every time I have contacted support, I get a response within a few hours.  The site is very responsive and when it is not, they warn me ahead of time.  I know I am a small customer and don't have millions in my account, but they treat me like I do.Remember this is not yet available in the USA, its because of US regulations.  So don't knock them down because of this.I do love the bonuses they offer for trading.  They have spotted coupons from time to time to allow me to test my skills at trading.  They allowed me to keep the profits as the coupons expired.I do definitely recommend this trading platform, but do go slow if you are a beginner as there is lots to learn about trading...any questions, I am happy to answer...thanks...Stan...

list_of_reviews.review_title: The Essence of Cryptocurrency: Coins and Blockchain
list_of_reviews.review: **Title: The Essence of Cryptocurrency: Coins and Blockchain**Coins are digital assets that operate on decentralized blockchain technology, serving as mediums of exchange and stores of value. Unlike traditional currencies, cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum are secured through a distributed ledger system, where transactions are validated by a network of nodes, ensuring transparency and integrity. This innovative framework not only facilitates peer-to-peer transactions but also powers decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, enabling users to lend, borrow, and trade without intermediaries. As the cryptocurrency landscape evolves, the interplay between coins and blockchain is set to redefine financial systems and enhance global economic interactions.Please Visit website coinmedia.live

list_of_reviews.review: During P2P arbitration this company has been absolutely awful. They never solve anything just ask for more info. They send out pre written responses and barely look over the grievance. There's no customer support line either. I would avoid these worthless eaters.

Probably the worst company in this industry for many reasons. Their app is problematic 99% of the time, and they offer no assistance at all to their customers. Withdrawing and depositing your assets is pretty much impossible and at this point i class all my investment as lost.Their 2FA authorisation email is never received when requested to login to their app and servicea, yet their company bombard you with promotions via email several times a day.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin is not available for US…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin is not available for US customers.  Since I joined long before that fact I have been blocked from moving funds to my other US accounts. I suppose I'm just out my $1000 bucks in crypto.  What a scam.  I hope they are crushed and experience due retribution.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of the biggest scams in the industry. Their operating logic is to list as many coins as possible that have social visibility, e.g. lots of Twitter followers. This listing means that the customer acquisition costs almost nothing because the followers are excited by the listing, transfer the coins to Kucoin and then naturally trade the coin. This makes it possible, and I'm sure many of you have done the same, to trade other coins as well. These listings come up almost every day, several a week. And every now and then, Kucoin at one time delists 10-20 or several dozen coins at once. When I started actively updating this process on Kucoin's Telegram page, quite matter-of-factly questioning the numerous listings and the huge number of delistings, Kucoin so typically on the spur of the moment banned me and did not want to have an open discussion about their methods. Anyone who follows Kucoin can draw the same conclusion.

No Way

list_of_reviews.review: Absolutely atrocious customer service. I was assured a failed deposit would be recovered in 5 days for a few of $80. I paid the fee immediately despite it being completely excessive. 8 weeks have passed and despite hastening every single day, I still haven't had my tokens sent back to me.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of the biggest scams in the industry. Their operating logic is to list as many coins as possible that have social visibility, e.g. lots of Twitter followers. This listing means that the customer acquisition costs almost nothing because the followers are excited by the listing, transfer the coins to Kucoin and then naturally trade the coin. This makes it possible, and I'm sure many of you have done the same, to trade other coins as well. These listings come up almost every day, several a week. And every now and then, Kucoin at one time delists 10-20 or several dozen coins at once. When I started actively updating this process on Kucoin's Telegram page, quite matter-of-factly questioning the numerous listings and the huge number of delistings, Kucoin so typically on the spur of the moment banned me and did not want to have an open discussion about their methods. Anyone who follows Kucoin can draw the same conclusion.

I signed up, because i had been deceived by third parties that no KYC verification is needed for depsoit, to find out that's not the case.Nevertheless when i tried to delete my account, they asked me for phone verification, that's INSANE and UNREALSITIC, submitting and revealing  my phone number for my account deletion ! No Way

Not for the first time!! Kucoin has delisted HIBEANZ and HISEALS, and perhaps a few more coins, with no warning whatsoever. I have lost $$. Now I would like to withdraw my remaining USDT, and withdrawals have been suspended. A complete SCAM, shame on these people, and shame on me for trusting them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I really don't like giving 5 stars out…
list_of_reviews.review: I really don't like giving 5 stars out because more often then not I get burned right after.However, Kucoin has been my go to crypto platform.  Even with KYC, there was some issues with my account not showing verified when it was.  Kucoin was nice enough to set my account to allow me full access until the issues were resolved on their side.Every time I have contacted support, I get a response within a few hours.  The site is very responsive and when it is not, they warn me ahead of time.  I know I am a small customer and don't have millions in my account, but they treat me like I do.Remember this is not yet available in the USA, its because of US regulations.  So don't knock them down because of this.I do love the bonuses they offer for trading.  They have spotted coupons from time to time to allow me to test my skills at trading.  They allowed me to keep the profits as the coupons expired.I do definitely recommend this trading platform, but do go slow if you are a beginner as there is lots to learn about trading...any questions, I am happy to answer...thanks...Stan...

list_of_reviews.review_title: The Essence of Cryptocurrency: Coins and Blockchain
list_of_reviews.review: **Title: The Essence of Cryptocurrency: Coins and Blockchain**Coins are digital assets that operate on decentralized blockchain technology, serving as mediums of exchange and stores of value. Unlike traditional currencies, cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum are secured through a distributed ledger system, where transactions are validated by a network of nodes, ensuring transparency and integrity. This innovative framework not only facilitates peer-to-peer transactions but also powers decentralized finance (DeFi) applications, enabling users to lend, borrow, and trade without intermediaries. As the cryptocurrency landscape evolves, the interplay between coins and blockchain is set to redefine financial systems and enhance global economic interactions.Please Visit website coinmedia.live

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin is not available for US…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin is not available for US customers.  Since I joined long before that fact I have been blocked from moving funds to my other US accounts. I suppose I'm just out my $1000 bucks in crypto.  What a scam.  I hope they are crushed and experience due retribution.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of the biggest scams in the industry. Their operating logic is to list as many coins as possible that have social visibility, e.g. lots of Twitter followers. This listing means that the customer acquisition costs almost nothing because the followers are excited by the listing, transfer the coins to Kucoin and then naturally trade the coin. This makes it possible, and I'm sure many of you have done the same, to trade other coins as well. These listings come up almost every day, several a week. And every now and then, Kucoin at one time delists 10-20 or several dozen coins at once. When I started actively updating this process on Kucoin's Telegram page, quite matter-of-factly questioning the numerous listings and the huge number of delistings, Kucoin so typically on the spur of the moment banned me and did not want to have an open discussion about their methods. Anyone who follows Kucoin can draw the same conclusion.

No Way

list_of_reviews.review_title: I really don't like giving 5 stars out…
list_of_reviews.review: I really don't like giving 5 stars out because more often then not I get burned right after.However, Kucoin has been my go to crypto platform.  Even with KYC, there was some issues with my account not showing verified when it was.  Kucoin was nice enough to set my account to allow me full access until the issues were resolved on their side.Every time I have contacted support, I get a response within a few hours.  The site is very responsive and when it is not, they warn me ahead of time.  I know I am a small customer and don't have millions in my account, but they treat me like I do.Remember this is not yet available in the USA, its because of US regulations.  So don't knock them down because of this.I do love the bonuses they offer for trading.  They have spotted coupons from time to time to allow me to test my skills at trading.  They allowed me to keep the profits as the coupons expired.I do definitely recommend this trading platform, but do go slow if you are a beginner as there is lots to learn about trading...any questions, I am happy to answer...thanks...Stan...

They ask me a small amount to cash out for the merchant, and then it doubles and becomes huge. They told me they would not refund my payment if I did not give another huge amount because my account was frozen. They keep telling me I have made a mistake in withdrawing, but in fact, their system keeps rejecting my refund request. When I tried to access their website to withdraw a portion of the amount, they told me my account was frozen. The finance department told me to complain to anyone I like.

Probably the worst company in this industry for many reasons. Their app is problematic 99% of the time, and they offer no assistance at all to their customers. Withdrawing and depositing your assets is pretty much impossible and at this point i class all my investment as lost.Their 2FA authorisation email is never received when requested to login to their app and servicea, yet their company bombard you with promotions via email several times a day.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin is not available for US…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin is not available for US customers.  Since I joined long before that fact I have been blocked from moving funds to my other US accounts.  I went to their telegram page and was harassed and my phone was robo called over 100 times in just a few minutes.  I deleted telegram to prevent them from locking up my phone.  I suppose I'm just out my $1000 bucks in crypto.  What a scam.  I hope they are crushed and experience due retribution.

The site is very responsive and when it is not, they warn me ahead of time.  I know I am a small customer and don't have millions in my account, but they treat me like I do.Remember this is not yet available in the USA, its because of US regulations.  So don't knock them down because of this.I do love the bonuses they offer for trading.  They have spotted coupons from time to time to allow me to test my skills at trading.  They allowed me to keep the profits as the coupons expired.I do definitely recommend this trading platform, but do go slow if you are a beginner as there is lots to learn about trading...any questions, I am happy to answer...thanks...Stan...

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of the biggest scams in the industry. Their operating logic is to list as many coins as possible that have social visibility, e.g. lots of Twitter followers. This listing means that the customer acquisition costs almost nothing because the followers are excited by the listing, transfer the coins to Kucoin and then naturally trade the coin. This makes it possible, and I'm sure many of you have done the same, to trade other coins as well. These listings come up almost every day, several a week. And every now and then, Kucoin at one time delists 10-20 or several dozen coins at once. When I started actively updating this process on Kucoin's Telegram page, quite matter-of-factly questioning the numerous listings and the huge number of delistings, Kucoin so typically on the spur of the moment banned me and did not want to have an open discussion about their methods. Anyone who follows Kucoin can draw the same conclusion.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of the biggest scams in the industry. Their operating logic is to list as many coins as possible that have social visibility, e.g. lots of Twitter followers. This listing means that the customer acquisition costs almost nothing because the followers are excited by the listing, transfer the coins to Kucoin and then naturally trade the coin. This makes it possible, and I'm sure many of you have done the same, to trade other coins as well. These listings come up almost every day, several a week. And every now and then, Kucoin at one time delists 10-20 or several dozen coins at once. When I started actively updating this process on Kucoin's Telegram page, quite matter-of-factly questioning the numerous listings and the huge number of delistings, Kucoin so typically on the spur of the moment banned me and did not want to have an open discussion about their methods. Anyone who follows Kucoin can draw the same conclusion.

Not for the first time!! Kucoin has delisted HIBEANZ and HISEALS, and perhaps a few more coins, with no warning whatsoever. I have lost $$. Now I would like to withdraw my remaining USDT, and withdrawals have been suspended. A complete SCAM, shame on these people, and shame on me for trusting them.

I signed up, because i had been deceived by third parties that no KYC verification is needed for depsoit, to find out that's not the case.Nevertheless when i tried to delete my account, they asked me for phone verification, that's INSANE and UNREALSITIC, submitting and revealing  my phone number for my account deletion ! No Way

Im actively using KuCoin for a few years and even have their KuCard. Yesterday I've realized when you do fast trade (Ive bought 321 USDT for 300€) but it was supposed to be 326,34 USDT, the only fee menitoned was "0.3€" so im wondering where the other 5$ went.Then, today ive bought $10 in Litecoin using USDT - 10 USDT were removed but I received only 9.40$ worth of Litecoin.another 0.60$ (or 6%) fees and I've no clue where they come from, also contacted them about this issue but their response was just "we cant do anything", weirdly didnt explained "why" even tho that was my one and only question.not sure about this company anymore.

list_of_reviews.review_title: I really don't like giving 5 stars out…
list_of_reviews.review: I really don't like giving 5 stars out because more often then not I get burned right after.However, Kucoin has been my go to crypto platform.  Even with KYC, there was some issues with my account not showing verified when it was.  Kucoin was nice enough to set my account to allow me full access until the issues were resolved on their side.Every time I have contacted support, I get a response within a few hours.  The site is very responsive and when it is not, they warn me ahead of time.  I know I am a small customer and don't have millions in my account, but they treat me like I do.Remember this is not yet available in the USA, its because of US regulations.  So don't knock them down because of this.I do love the bonuses they offer for trading.  They have spotted coupons from time to time to allow me to test my skills at trading.  They allowed me to keep the profits as the coupons expired.I do definitely recommend this trading platform, but do go slow if you are a beginner as there is lots to learn about trading...any questions, I am happy to answer...thanks...Stan...

list_of_reviews.review_title: KUCOIN, I WANT MY MONEY YOU REFUSE TO GIVE ME
list_of_reviews.review: KuCoin decided not to allow American customers to use their platform. Fine that's their prerogative. HOWEVER...they made this decision AFTER I deposited Fiat onto their platform. They gave a deadline on when to get it out, and BLOCKED all methods to which I can get the money out. I'm over it, and I'm sure this has been said by multitudes of people, but I MEAN IT WHEN I SAY IT....I WILL BE CONTACTING A LAWYER, let the courts handle it, IM TIRED OF GETTING BURNED!

list_of_reviews.review_title: RUNAWAY IF YOU WANT TO KEEP YOU MONNEY.
list_of_reviews.review: RUNAWAY IF YOU WANT TO KEEP YOU MONNEY.this the worst exchange i have ever seen, the fees are literaly purging your account.you put a trade, you put your SL, its calculating your loss automaticaly, saying you will lose 50$, you come back, you see your account f*****ng purged, you go to the history and boom, -108$.and dont even think i forgot the SL or something like that, i can understand its happening one time maybe its my bad, i forgot. BUT ITS EVERY F******NG TIME!losing 20$? taking 40.losing 150? mmmh i'm gonna take 240$this shit is f*****ng crazy.RUNAWAY.
