Stay away from these thieves!!!After I lost all my money because of their buggy software, they don't even want to send me a tax report. They suck!!

Absolutely atrocious customer service. I was assured a failed deposit would be recovered in 5 days for a few of $80. I paid the fee immediately despite it being completely excessive. 8 weeks have passed and despite hastening every single day, I still haven't had my tokens sent back to me.

The worst CEX ever!! How can u Just delist still valuable and tradable tokens, with a real world utility/application, without any direct and clear communication at all with your impacted customers, setting just a 6 months timeframe for their withdrawal from your platform, otherwise not Just SEIZING THESE TOKENS, COMPREHENSIVELY EVENTUALLY WORTH EVEN MILLIONS OF USD, but without even, like all other major Cexes do, COMPENSATING THEIR, EVENTUALLY EVEN HIGH LOSSES, BY AUTOMATICALLY SWAPPING THESE DELISTED TOKENS WITH KCS/BTC?!?

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of the biggest scams in the industry. Their operating logic is to list as many coins as possible that have social visibility, e.g. lots of Twitter followers. This listing means that the customer acquisition costs almost nothing because the followers are excited by the listing, transfer the coins to Kucoin and then naturally trade the coin. This makes it possible, and I'm sure many of you have done the same, to trade other coins as well. These listings come up almost every day, several a week. And every now and then, Kucoin at one time delists 10-20 or several dozen coins at once. When I started actively updating this process on Kucoin's Telegram page, quite matter-of-factly questioning the numerous listings and the huge number of delistings, Kucoin so typically on the spur of the moment banned me and did not want to have an open discussion about their methods. Anyone who follows Kucoin can draw the same conclusion.

Not for the first time!! Kucoin has delisted HIBEANZ and HISEALS, and perhaps a few more coins, with no warning whatsoever. I have lost $$. Now I would like to withdraw my remaining USDT, and withdrawals have been suspended. A complete SCAM, shame on these people, and shame on me for trusting them.

list_of_reviews.review_title: scammers who lure people into buying…
list_of_reviews.review: scammers who lure people into buying crypto in every possible way, but then you will never get that money back. Customer support responds with one phrase: "we are working on your problem".

I signed up, because i had been deceived by third parties that no KYC verification is needed for depsoit, to find out that's not the case.Nevertheless when i tried to delete my account, they asked me for phone verification, that's INSANE and UNREALSITIC, submitting and revealing  my phone number for my account deletion ! No Way

Customer service doesn't respond- Winnie, Jessica, Elaine, George purposely don't provide answers or make you jump through multiple hoops that lead to nowhere. How do these people sleep at night? Evil.

Great experience so far! I could buy what I needed of crypto and withdraw it directly from the wallet in which I needed to spend it. I can't complain after having a negative experience with a competitor.

list_of_reviews.review_title: During P2P arbitration this company has…
list_of_reviews.review: During P2P arbitration this company has been absolutely awful. They never solve anything just ask for more info. They send out pre written responses and barely look over the grievance. There's no customer support line either. I would avoid these worthless eaters.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa…
list_of_reviews.review: Ive lost like 3 years ago my 2fa indentification. I tryed many times to recover my account. I showed my passport aswell i know my log in. I offered them to show anything they want but they only accept a transfer code from another server. I dont know this and aswell most servers dont even exist anymore. Basically they steal my coins this way since they refuse to help me. Feels a bit criminal to me :(

Im actively using KuCoin for a few years and even have their KuCard. Yesterday I've realized when you do fast trade (Ive bought 321 USDT for 300€) but it was supposed to be 326,34 USDT, the only fee menitoned was "0.3€" so im wondering where the other 5$ went.Then, today ive bought $10 in Litecoin using USDT - 10 USDT were removed but I received only 9.40$ worth of Litecoin.another 0.60$ (or 6%) fees and I've no clue where they come from, also contacted them about this issue but their response was just "we cant do anything", weirdly didnt explained "why" even tho that was my one and only question.not sure about this company anymore.

Kucoin has interesting earning products but the customer support is a disaster. If you have assets there, pray you don't need their help then you have to forget about your assets.All of the customer support personnel are witless and dumb. When you reach online chat they answer you with hackneyed responses and direct you to submit a ticket and then leave the chat. The people who answer the tickets are also dimwitted and answer you with unrelated and irresponsible responses.

list_of_reviews.review_title: KUCOIN, I WANT MY MONEY YOU REFUSE TO GIVE ME
list_of_reviews.review: KuCoin decided not to allow American customers to use their platform. Fine that's their prerogative. HOWEVER...they made this decision AFTER I deposited Fiat onto their platform. They gave a deadline on when to get it out, and BLOCKED all methods to which I can get the money out. list_of_reviews.review_title: THEY DO NOT HELP WHEN SCAMMED
list_of_reviews.review: I used KuCoin to complete several transactions that were part of a scam I unfortunately fell victim to in 2023. After transferring a significant amount of money, I realized that I had been scammed, and when I reached out to KuCoin for assistance, their response was shockingly unhelpful.Despite providing all relevant details and even involving law enforcement, KuCoin refused to cooperate or provide any support. They were unable or unwilling to help reverse the transactions, even though the funds were transferred to accounts linked to the scammers.What’s most concerning is their lack of communication and failure to engage with the police or take any meaningful action. As a victim of fraud, I expected better protection, assistance, and cooperation, especially from a platform that handles substantial amounts of money.KuCoin’s lack of transparency and unwillingness to help in cases of fraud makes it difficult to trust the platform moving forward. I strongly advise caution when using their services, especially when it comes to high-risk activities like cryptocurrency trading. In my case, they showed no regard for customer safety or fraud prevention, leaving me feeling unsupported and deeply frustrated.I would not recommend KuCoin to anyone looking for a secure and responsible platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: THEY DO NOT HELP WHEN SCAMMED
list_of_reviews.review: I used KuCoin to complete several transactions that were part of a scam I unfortunately fell victim to in 2023. After transferring a significant amount of money, I realized that I had been scammed, and when I reached out to KuCoin for assistance, their response was shockingly unhelpful.Despite providing all relevant details and even involving law enforcement, KuCoin refused to cooperate or provide any support. They were unable or unwilling to help reverse the transactions, even though the funds were transferred to accounts linked to the scammers.What’s most concerning is their lack of communication and failure to engage with the police or take any meaningful action. As a victim of fraud, I expected better protection, assistance, and cooperation, especially from a platform that handles substantial amounts of money.KuCoin’s lack of transparency and unwillingness to help in cases of fraud makes it difficult to trust the platform moving forward. I strongly advise caution when using their services, especially when it comes to high-risk activities like cryptocurrency trading. In my case, they showed no regard for customer safety or fraud prevention, leaving me feeling unsupported and deeply frustrated.I would not recommend KuCoin to anyone looking for a secure and responsible platform.

list_of_reviews.review_title: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of…
list_of_reviews.review: Kucoin customer acquisition is one of the biggest scams in the industry. Their operating logic is to list as many coins as possible that have social visibility, e.g. lots of Twitter followers. This listing means that the customer acquisition costs almost nothing because the followers are excited by the listing, transfer the coins to Kucoin and then naturally trade the coin. This makes it possible, and I'm sure many of you have done the same, to trade other coins as well. These listings come up almost every day, several a week. And every now and then, Kucoin at one time delists 10-20 or several dozen coins at once. When I started actively updating this process on Kucoin's Telegram page, quite matter-of-factly questioning the numerous listings and the huge number of delistings, Kucoin so typically on the spur of the moment banned me and did not want to have an open discussion about their methods. Anyone who follows Kucoin can draw the same conclusion.

No Way
